name: Full Pitch
description:
Full Pitch is a classic arcade-alike game with vibrant retro style graphics and simple controls that offer depth and mastery to players who seek it.
Your progress will be tracked and your highest score displayed on the start screen. Do you best to beat your own and your friend's highest scores.
You can use the edge of the screen to warp from edge to edge for advanced movement to maintain your run. There is no limit to how much you can warp, so use this power at will.

Full Pitch will never have paid DLC, no loot boxes or pay walls of any kind, to ensure the focus remains on gameplay.
